Attend to your customers 24/7 over WhatsApp.


Automate your tickets processing and accept payments anytime.

How it works

Why WhatsApp and Automation?

WhatsApp is the world's most popular messaging app with 1.5 billion active users. Most, if not all of your customers are probably on WhatsApp. We leverage our technology to connect you with your customers in their favorite messaging app and automate your most impotant business processes.

Our flasghip product is a chatbot agent that helps businesses engage with their customers over conversational interfaces like WhatsApp. Starting with sectors that rely heavily on ticketing, we allow businesses to automate their tickets processing systems and accept payments anytime from their customers.

Automated FAQs

Our chatbot agent responds to your active customers even when your customer care agents are all on break. It monitors all incoming requests from WhatsApp and attend to custmers's enquiries in real-time, 24/7.

Learn More  

Autonomous Bookings

The autonomous agent can connect to our backend to automate bookings and reservations for your clients. We currently have support for mobile money and plan to support more payment options in the near future. We provide you with a dashboard to keep track of the bookings coming through, and we can also integrate with your existing CRM or accounting systems.

Learn More  

Bringing Autonomous Services To Various Sectors

Transportation

Travellers can now book their bus or flight tickets directly from WhatsApp.
